column2: An ancient Sony VAIO laptop; Pentium M 1.5 MHz processor; 512 MB RAM
Custom Perl script using these external tools: pod2man, pod2text, pod2html, perldoc, pod2pdf and perltidy
Perl v5.8 or higher; DBI, DBD-mysql, DBD-Oracle, DBD-Pg to use database scripts
